snippet: A new exhibition at the Museum of Arts and Design, “The Art of Scent: 1889-2012,” showcases 12 fragrances that demonstrate the evolution of modern perfumery.
abstract: Museum of Arts and Design exhibition The Art of Scent: 1889-2012 showcases 12 fragrances that demonstrate the evolution of modern perfumery.
lead_paragraph: A new exhibition at the Museum of Arts and Design, “The Art of Scent: 1889-2012,” showcases 12 fragrances that demonstrate the evolution of modern perfumery.

headline.seo: ‘The Art of Scent’ at the Museum of Arts and Design
headline.main: Fragrances as Art, Displayed Squirt by Squirt
